modName: Dragon Carved Armor Set - Weathered Retexture
summary: A retexture that gives dragon carved armor set a more weathered look
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=6]Dragon Carved Armor Set[/size][/u] [size=6]-[/size] [font=Trebuchet MS][size=6]Weathered[/size][/font][size=5] Retexture
[/size][b][u][i]by [size=4]kanzlerhendri

[/size][/i][/u][/b]I really like[size=2] hideto84's[/size][size=4] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66130/?][color=#B45F06][i][color=#f6b26b]Dragon Carved Armor set[/color][/i][/color][/url], [size=2]but i always thought the original looked too clean. So I made my own version. This requires the original mod.

Version 1.0
- Only the body parts are done. Helmet and shield still use the original texture

INSTALLATION
Unpack to your Data folder in Skyrim.

RECOMMENDED
The version without Pauldrons looks absolutely amazing with [color=#f6b26b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches[/url][/size][/color]. So be sure to check it out...
[img]https://s31.postimg.org/ejy5c0haj/TESV_exe_DX9_20160618_160247.jpg[/img]


Please do endorse the original mod and my retexture if you liked it. [/size][/size]
author: kanzlerhendri
